context: In 2024, ANSYS has 39.85% market share in the simulation-modeling market and competes with 56 tools. The top alternatives are Simulink (17.95%), Ansys Structures (7.16%), and SolidWorks Simulation (4.76%). For FY2024, ANSYS reported total revenue of $2.269 billion, a 9.7% increase from 2023. The proposed acquisition of ANSYS by Synopsys, announced in January 2024, highlights market consolidation, creating a new entity with strong position in EDA and simulation. Open-source software like OpenFOAM presents challenges for academic and SMB segments. Major competitors include Dassault Systèmes, Siemens, Altair, and Autodesk.
